products.title: Capri (Blackout) Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: The delicate silver curve pattern of the capri (blackout) pure tempers the bright white that lies beneath, and catches the light at every turn. Adjust the louvres to control the light to your liking, and enjoy this practical yet visually pleasing vertical blind. By hanging in the kitchen, you get attractive simplicity combined with wipe-clean practicality, as well as a blank canvas against which to sit the rest of your dcor.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) White - Vertical Blind
products.description: Brilliant white shades are the most malleable of all, and that's the beauty of the palermo (blackout) in white. Adjustable louvres, that are easily cleaned, allow you to control how much light and privacy you have in your home, whilst allowing the light to bounce off them. Make a bold red stand out even more, or a forest green really come to life, by placing the white amongst them. Wonderfully suited to a bathroom or kitchen environment, where freshness and clean hues are everything, this blind can take part in almost any colour scheme.

products.title: Cotswold Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Light and unassuming, the cotswold ghost white is a matt painted blind, comprising of thick, sturdy slats, a strong pelmet and headrail, and a matching bottom rail and acorns. And, treated well for protection, you can be sure that this blind won't warp or crack in use. For a fresh and inviting look in a country kitchen, couple the ghost white with a lush apple green. Use the green on the walls and match matt white tiles to the blind, then accessorise with the two tones to your heart's content.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Snow - Vertical Blind
products.description: From the safety conscious roma (fr) collection, the snow is a flame retardant blind, making it the perfect pick for a commercial property. Its practicality doesn't end there though, as the tilted vertical slats can be adjusted to suit your desired light, privacy, and ventilation. The snow will provide the ideal accent to a bold and bright colour scheme in a home office, where a sense of life and energy is all-important.

products.title: Blackout Roller White (Blackout) - Loft Blind
products.description: Order from the skyline (blackout) collection before 10am and select fasttrack at checkout for next working day delivery. Featuring simple, plain colours and a pvc backing to help to block the light out when you need to get to sleep, the skyline (blackout) collection are some of their most popular skylight blinds. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Anthology Snowy Mountain - Roller Blind
products.description: Snow mountain provides a crisp white with a subtle hint of blue -perfect for injecting something a little unexpected into the mix. As you look closer you come to see that it's the quality of the weave that defines the fabric, and that it's just the level of detail you need to provide your interiors with new depth and clarity. Combine the blue undertone of snow mountain with a crisp apple green to create a light and vibrant space that doesn't overwhelm the senses.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Seashell White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other. The subtle use of colour and the effortlessly smooth texture evoke memories of relaxing down by the coast. Origin deluxe, seashell white - venetian blind seashell white from the origin deluxe range is an artistic blend of smooth and gentle colour on the one hand, and beautifully crafted coordinating fixtures on the other.

products.title: Bari Spc Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: From the popular bari spc range, the pure is a modern roller-blind produced from a selection of quality threads to form a distinct look and subtle texture. The sturdy yet paper-feel fabric and dainty stitching creates a modern feature in a refined and elegant cream shade. Pair this substantial cloth with opulent linens or plush velvety fabrics to produce classic style with compelling textures. Why not mingle the brilliant pure with rich wine hues and golden embellishments for a lavish look with an elegant colour combination? Bari spc, pure - roller blind from the popular bari spc range, the pure is a modern roller-blind produced from a selection of quality threads to form a distinct look and subtle texture.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Bright White - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pure snow white of the origin deluxe in bright white has a matt appearance that is at odds with its smooth and streamlined feel. Teamed with matching, high quality components, including designer-style ladder tapes, this blind is a real style statement. Pit the bright white against a bold, focal feature wall, painted in a bright cobalt or dark navy. Alternatively, go for an attention-grabbing wallpaper to create the same effect.

products.title: Cotswold Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Cosmic indeed, the cotswold's cosmic white gloss is a magically glossy venetian blind, where thick, tilting slats are painted in a deluxe white sheen. All components, including a headrail, bottom rail, and acorns, are finished to a high standard, and are provided in coordinating tones. Bring a bold, vivacious shade of tropical purple to life by painting a feature wall and placing the cosmic white gloss against it.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Cosmic White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Generate an enchanting window display with the cotswold deluxe in cosmic white, hosting polished, authentic basswood. This elegant arrangement of superior louvres, accompanied by quality components, creates a contemporary, venetian blind that is both practical and easy to install. For an attractive and soothing dcor scheme, display the cosmic white in the bathroom, amongst gleaming white tiles and elegant ceramics.

products.title: Ferns Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and contemplate whether to introduce ferns snow into your home take a minute to think about what you're seeing. The lightweight fabric works perfectly with the crisp white to make you feel at ease the moment you walk in the door. Plus you have the natural inspiration of the plant pattern underneath. It's simple decor at its finest. Take your room in an exciting creative direction by doing away with everything other than natural finishes and looks.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Ghost White - Venetian Blind
products.description: Featuring a matt white colouring, wide, sturdy slats, and a heavy duty headrail and pelmet, the cotswold deluxe in ghost white will make a beautiful addition to any home. Coordinating parts, including woven ladder tapes, finish the look off neatly and with style. Set the ghost white against a country floral wallpaper for a rural look in either a contemporary or period property. Pick your favourite colour or two from the paper and use them to accent the room, in the form of throws, cushions, and ornaments.

products.title: Crosshatch Clean White - Roller Blind
products.description: Neutral decor doesn't have to be plain and simple if you don't want it to be, so why settle for less? That was the thinking behind their crosshatch collection, and it's what brings clean white to life. The intricate stitching that creates the geometric pattern is truly a joy to behold. As you stand back and admire the gentle presence of clean white you can start thinking about matching options. A light cream and a darker charcoal grey are great options to explore a little further.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout) Snowy Mountain - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology (blackout) snowy mountain captures the colour and texture of one of the natural world's most incredible sights, and it does it all whilst creating a design that's fit for any contemporary home. The intricate stitching catches your attention up close, whilst the radiance of he brilliant white pulls you in from afar. Match anthology (blackout) snowy mountain with plenty of light greys and dark browns if you really want to amplify the natural colours on show.

products.title: Luster Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: Luster snow puts you at ease and welcomes you through the door just like all great decor should. The delicate construction of the fabric belies its durability and functionality, whilst the off-white colour is the perfect blend of paper white and cream. The unique colour makes it a great candidate for the guest bedroom. This is a space where you want to add some understated style that will welcome your visitors, but not so much that it overwhelms them by imposing your own taste too heavily.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki Pure - Roller Blind
products.description: Our zaragoza collection features enoki pure, a fabric so refined and elegant that it offers you something new and exciting from every angle. The energetic patterning catches the eye and serves as the perfect accompaniment to the shimmer of the fabric. It's everything you could want for the modern home. We love the idea of using enoki pure in the bedroom where it can add that sleek touch of chic you've been searching for.

products.title: Visage Frost - Roller Blind
products.description: Visage frost is perfect for those of you looking for an understated calming addition to your interiors. The gentle transitions in colour and texture between the stripes is what gives the visage collection its unique aesthetic, and when you combine it with the slightly cold and crisp colour of frost you experience something truly special. Frost works wonders in the kitchen or bathroom where you want to add a subtle touch of style without overpowering the existing features.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout) Silk White - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of verdi (blackout) silk white is the way in which it sits there ever so luxurious, and yet it remains neutral at the same time. It's a hard balance to strike, but when you see it you'll wonder why you never thought of it before. Taking your decor in a luxury direction is what we all dream of, so why wait any longer? A black leather couch and a large rug under the coffee table would be ideal ways to take the living room where you want to go.

products.title: Bari Spc Pure - Vertical Blind
products.description: Appropriately named, the bari spc in pure displays a beautifully clean, lily white hue that serves as the perfect canvas for the lightly stitched texturing of the thick yet papery fabric. The adjustable louvres hang in an orderly fashion to convey a neat and contemporary aesthetic. Craft a refreshingly airy atmosphere in the master bedroom by combining the pure with matching white walls and bedlinen, opting for polished wooden floorboards and light wood furniture.

products.title: Mayfair White - Roman Blind
products.description: Simply toned, this time with fresh white, the mayfair is a combination of deluxe silky threads and sumptuous cotton, creating a sheer and shimmering blind with elegant finesse, whilst sewn-in batons within each fold encourage a graceful fall and prevent the layers from sagging. Generate a luxurious effect by adorning the white with contrasting textures and intense colours, both to frame the silky blind and to add depth and personality.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) White - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Cosmic White Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Bring a plush white sheen into your home by choosing the cosmic white gloss, a shiny painted venetian blind from the cotswold deluxe range. This clean, fresh window dressing has all of the high end features of a designer blind, including coordinating linen ladder tapes and a top quality finish. For an ultra-modern and incredibly striking look in a dining room, go all white. Furnish the room from top to bottom in white, from walls to flooring to furniture, and the cosmic white gloss will fit right in.

products.title: Faux Suede White - Roman Blind
products.description: The faux suede in white takes a lightweight, suede-feel cloth and covers it with a sea of pure white, making for an icy cool blind that gets its warmth from its soft texture. This supple fabric will fold easily into the pleated curves of the roman, leaving a dreamy and wistful ambience. The white offers a beautifully clean aesthetic, making it the perfect base from which to add brighteror darker hues with plenty of personality.

products.title: Bird Garden Canvas - Roman Blind
products.description: Incorporate the enchanting bird garden canvas into your dcor for a sophisticated look with charming detail, where a soft, cotton-like fabric hosts a display of feathered friends and creative foliage in soothing white on a mild oatmeal background. Display the canvas amid layers of splendid linen in harmonising caramel and biscuit shades, framing the blind with honeyed fabrics and complementing colours.

products.title: Vogue White - Day Night Blind
products.description: The sharp, icy hue of the vogue in white gives a clean and fresh look, and the sleekness of the fabric does nothing to contradict it. With its moveable translucent strips, for privacy and light control, this blind is truly the height of contemporary style. Team the white with a deep, dark navy blue to form a naval theme in the dining room. A navy feature wall, with the blind sat in its midst, will look simply stunning.

products.title: Windsor White - Roman Blind
products.description: Pure and simple, the windsor white is the colour of snow, and adds a cool and refreshing vibe to the home without compromising on class or elegance. This light and pretty shade forms a beautiful roman blind, strengthened in appearance by the shimmering sheen of the silk-like fabric. The white can be paired with any colour combination you choose. It will look particularly attractive against a petrol blue shade to craft a contemporary nautical look in the bathroom.

products.title: Nairobi Snow - Roman Blind
products.description: The nairobi in snow adds a casual sense of glamour to any room, with its chocolate animal print and beautiful sketches. The fabric contains linen, giving it lasting durability as well as that classic linen look and feel. Hang the snow amidst similar browns and creams, and consider a deep chocolate feature wall for a striking look. Add shimmering golds and plush camels for a truly luxurious style, and be sure to throw in plenty of soft fabrics for extra comfort.

products.title: Astral Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: When you want to be able to reinvent your interiors and breathe new life into proceedings, your window spaces hold the key. Astral snow enables you to introduce a soft grey and a creamy base colour so that you have plenty of new creative avenues you could go down. It's all about simple neutral colours that subtly transform into one another when you want that relaxing homely vibe. Magnolia walls, a light stained wooden floor, and a few lamps rather than dazzling overhead lighting are all you really need to make things nice and cosy.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Snow - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Capri (Blackout) Pure - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Roller 1028 White - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Flying Pleated 1016 White - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1016 white - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Luxa White - Vista Blind
products.description: Every square inch of luxa white shimmers in the sunlight as it serves as the perfect transition between light and shade. With a finely woven fabric accompanied by a delicate voile to offer you complete control of ambience and light, luxa white allows you to create the perfect environment to suit your mood. Crisp and clean, the modern lines of luxa white make it ideal for the modern fitted bathroom where you can add an understated feature that won't confront your existing decor.

products.title: Flying Pleated 1257 Wavy White - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1257 wavy white - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Semi-transparentinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1256 classic white - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.description: Soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. Roman blind, 6500 delicious white - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.description: Control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows. Water and stain resistant - well suited for bathrooms and kitchens. Roman blind, 6505 white leaves - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - opaquenot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Roman Blind 6501 Classic White - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility. Fabric can be dismounted for easy cleaning. Installs in minutes with the unique velux pick&click. System. Roman blind, 6501 classic white - velux loft blind soft lighting effects - semi-transparentnot fixed to the top or bottom allowing 100% flexibility.

products.title: Daytona Vivid White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: White doesn't get much whiter or brighter than the daytona in vivid white. This icy white hue covers the durable faux wood of the shutter flawlessly, and works wonderfully as any of their different style options: tier on tier, caf, or full height. Pair the vivid white with any colour scheme you like, but for a truly striking style, stick to an all-white theme in an open-plan kitchen. Think white walls, white units, white floor, white everything - the look will be bold and vivacious, and certainly hard to forget.

products.title: Daytona Antique White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Daytona's antique white offers a beautiful classic white with a vintage overtone. The faux wood is durable and resistant to cracking and warping from moisture, wear, and tear. It's also an energy efficient solution for your home. Choose from three different styles. Use the antique white as part of a shabby chic or vintage dcor scheme, surrounding it with dusky shades of pink or blue for a pretty yet elegant look in a bedroom or living room.

products.title: Daytona Cool White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: Available in three distinct yet equally lovely styles, the daytona cool white is neutral, calming, and stylish. Go for the caf for a boutique look, full height for a classic shutter, or tier on tier for something with a difference and plenty of flexibility. Set the cool white against equally cool pastel shades, such as mint green or baby blue. Accessorise throughout with matching pastel hues, as well as plenty of white.

products.title: Daytona Pure White - Plantation Shutter
products.description: The daytona in pure white offers a classic white tone that will work in any surrounding. Made from high quality, durable faux wood, the shutter is designed to resist cracking and warping. Choose from three key styles: full height, caf, or tier on tier. Paint the wall surrounding the pure white in a bold, cheery colour that will allow the shutter to stand out and create a focal point in the room. Think apple green in the kitchen, sky blue in the home office, or lemon yellow in the guest bedroom.

products.title: Bayham Pure White - Vista Blind
products.description: To allow the light that enters your room to take centre stage your blind should be crisp and clean. Modern lines give bayham pure white the contemporary look that allows it to hang with effortless grace in your home as it offers complete control of the ambient light levels. The finely crafted voile panels serve as the perfect accompaniment for the clean glow of pure white. Keeping your decor simple yet styled is the secret to creating a contemporary home that will stay current for years to come.
